nodes.bodyText:
Would this cause a failure in opendistro build?
For example: https://github.com/opendistro-for-elasticsearch/opendistro-build/blob/opendistro-1.7/.github/workflows/build-tar.yml#L237

No impact. The opendistro-build doesn't run this code coverage part.
We disable the integration test coverage report and add the UT coverage report and test coverage verification as 50% as the lowest bar.
